Package index

Core Provider Classes

R6 classes for different LLM providers

Google
Google API Client
Anthropic
Anthropic API Client
OpenAI_Assistant
OpenAI Assistant API Client
OpenAI_Chat
OpenAI Chat Completions API Client
OpenAI_Responses
OpenAI Responses API Client
OpenRouter
OpenRouter API Client
LocalLLM
Local LLM API Client

Multimodal Content Functions

Functions for processing different types of inputs

as_text_content()
Convert inputs to text content for multimodal API requests
as_image_content()
Convert inputs to image content for multimodal API requests
as_pdf_content()
Convert inputs to PDF content for multimodal API requests
as_json_content()
Convert inputs to JSON content for multimodal API requests
as_file_content()
Convert inputs to file references for multimodal API requests

Tool & Schema Functions

Define tools and schemas for structured outputs using annotations or direct specification

tool()
Define Tool with Direct Parameter Specification
as_tool()
Convert Annotated Function to Tool Definition
schema()
Define Schema with Direct Parameter Specification
as_schema()
Convert Annotated Function to Output Schema

Common Provider Methods

Core R6 methods available on all Provider instances

Provider
Provider Base Class
